data.name: Kao the Kangaroo - Summer Drip
data.detailed_description:
Summer is here!

While everyone else drips with sweat, Kao is dripping with style! The free Summer Drip DLC adds two costumes to Kao’s wardrobe!
That’s four new pieces you can mix and match to create your own look.

Look like a respectable sailor ready for a new voyage, or the pool party look ready for a good time!
data.about_the_game:
Summer is here!

While everyone else drips with sweat, Kao is dripping with style! The free Summer Drip DLC adds two costumes to Kao’s wardrobe!
That’s four new pieces you can mix and match to create your own look.

Look like a respectable sailor ready for a new voyage, or the pool party look ready for a good time!
data.short_description: Get that summer look and strike a pose! The FREE Kao The Kangaroo DLC gives you four more style options to rock this summer!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 or newer
  • Processor: i5 3300 3,20 GHz 4 cores/4 threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 2 gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
